hymn.title: Divine Dispensing for the Life Supply
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—Satisfaction with Him

layout.singingstanza: We can eat, we can drink, We can en -- joy God, By lov -- ing His price -- less pres -- ence; We can eat, we can drink, We can en -- joy God By call -- ing His pre -- cious name. We need to love the Lord And keep His pure Word, And wear Christ as our clothes; We need to call His name, In Him re -- main, In Him, our soul -- life lose.

hymn.lyrics: n We can eat, we can drink, We can enjoy God, By loving His priceless presence; We can eat, we can drink, We can enjoy God By calling His precious name. We need to love the Lord And keep His pure Word, And wear Christ as our clothes; We need to call His name, In Him remain, In Him, our soul-life lose. (Chorus) We need to eat the Lord, Absorb His pure Word And breathe in Christ as life; And as we breathe God in, The Spirit begins Dispensing the life supply. (Chorus)
